item.title: See how InstaMorgage is using LangChain 🦜🔗 and LangSmith🦜🛠️ to build a premium product for their customers. MortgageAI, ContentAI, and Po...
item.description:
See how InstaMorgage is using LangChain 🦜🔗 and LangSmith🦜🛠️ to build a premium product for their customers. MortgageAI, ContentAI, and PolicyAI take the tedium out the mortgage loan process.

💫 Speed to resolution has increased by an average of 67%, and error rates have… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1733209012458651767

item.title: RT Harrison Chase: With Gemini's release, it's clear multimodality is here Thanks to @Saboo_Shubham_ for highlighting the great work @RLanceMartin did...
item.description:
RT Harrison Chase
With Gemini's release, it's clear multimodality is here

Thanks to @Saboo_Shubham_ for highlighting the great work @RLanceMartin did around creating a multimodal template!


Shubham Saboo: Multimodal RAG templates by LangChain

Slide decks are powerhouse of knowledge, yet their visual elements are out of the reach for most of the RAG applications.

Enter Multi-modal LLMs like GPT-4V that can enable Q+A assistants to interact seamlessly with the visual content of… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1733002954720895228
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Lance Martin: I've been testing a few different approaches for multi-modal RAG / QA over visual content w/ GPT-4V. I built an eval set on an invest...
item.description:
RT Lance Martin
I've been testing a few different approaches for multi-modal RAG / QA over visual content w/ GPT-4V. I built an eval set on an investor presentation (Q3 earnings from @datadoghq) as a test case. Results / learnings:

(1) Text loading: As a base-case, I loaded the slide deck w/ a… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1732862263026135197

item.title: ⭐️ Multi-modal RAG public benchmark ⭐️ Multi-modal LLMs are one of the most important emerging trends for the coming year. They promise to unlock ...
item.description:
⭐️ Multi-modal RAG public benchmark ⭐️

Multi-modal LLMs are one of the most important emerging trends for the coming year.

They promise to unlock new types of Q+A assistants over visual content, but multi-modal RAG architectures remain uncertain.

We are releasing a small… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1732839745112449142

item.title: RT Jacob Lee: 🤖 Connery Actions Tool for Agents 🤖 @connery_io is an OSS plugin infrastructure you can use with @LangChainAI JS/TS agents in 0.0....
item.description:
RT Jacob Lee
🤖 Connery Actions Tool for Agents 🤖

@connery_io is an OSS plugin infrastructure you can use with @LangChainAI JS/TS agents in 0.0.203!

Define a set of actions using integrations like Gmail, and let them handle auth + secret management.

s/o machulav!

https://js.langchain.com/docs/integrations/toolkits/connery
item.author: LangChain

item.title: A good guide of different local LLM options - and LangChain supports all of them!
item.description:
A good guide of different local LLM options - and LangChain supports all of them!


Patrick Loeber: Want to run LLMs locally on your Laptop?🤖💻

Here's a quick overview of the 5 best frameworks to run LLMs locally:

1. Ollama
Ollama allows you to run LLMs locally through your command line and is probably the easiest framework to get started with.

Just use the installer or the… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1732769003565678915

item.title: A deep dive on LangChain Expression Language from one of the best educators out there
item.description:

James Briggs: 🔥 Exploring @LangChainAI's expression language (LCEL) — explaining the syntax, how the interesting | operators work under the hood, and how to build parallel chains w/ custom functions + @cohere embeds

item.description:
💻LangChain x Pinecone SF Hacking Hours

Join us and @jamescalam from @pinecone for some fun hacking hours next Thursday in SF!

Meet other builders in the space, jam on end-of-year projects, and maybe demo something by the end!

Register here: https://www.pinecone.io/community/events/pinecone-x-langchain-meetup-sf-community-hacking-hours/

item.title: RT Raouf Chebri 🐘: Agreed. I wrote a few RAG pipelines from scratch and I wish I just used @LangChainAI.
item.description:
RT Raouf Chebri 🐘
Agreed.

I wrote a few RAG pipelines from scratch and I wish I just used @LangChainAI.


Stan Girard: Don't use @LangChainAI, it is just a wrapper that adds complexity...

Is a lie! And here is why ?

Two days ago I removed my custom code on @quivr_brain to embed files and used @LangChainAI. Guess what ? It made embedding 50/100 times faster and reduce my cloud cost by 2.

You… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1732437384615068108
item.author: LangChain

item.title: 🦜🥼Streamlining Healthcare Compliance with AI This collaborative effort by Independent Health, LangChain, and @UnstructuredIO dives deep into how...
item.description:
🦜🥼Streamlining Healthcare Compliance with AI

This collaborative effort by Independent Health, LangChain, and @UnstructuredIO dives deep into how to use AI to get high quality, reliable answers in a domain that requires them (healthcare)

Read it here: https://unstructured.io/blog/streamlining-healthcare-compliance-with-ai

item.description:
⭐️ Multi-modal RAG template ⭐️

Slide decks are a rich sources of information, but their visual elements are inaccessible to most RAG apps.

Multi-modal LLMs, like GPT-4V, can unlock RAG on slides, enabling Q+A assistants over visual content.
